db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: ProgressBar is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The ProgressBar is used to give an indication of the progress of an operation. value is updated regularly and must be between minimumValue and maximumValue.
You can create a custom appearance for a ProgressBar by assigning a ProgressBarStyle.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] hovered : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether the control is being hovered.

db:section.db:title: indeterminate : bool
db:section.db:para: This property toggles indeterminate mode. When the actual progress is unknown, use this option. The progress bar will be animated as a busy indicator instead. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: maximumValue : real
db:section.db:para: This property is the progress bar's maximum value. The value is clamped to this value. If maximumValue is smaller than minimumValue, minimumValue will be enforced. The default value is 1.

db:section.db:title: minimumValue : real
db:section.db:para: This property is the progress bar's minimum value. The value is clamped to this value. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: orientation : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property holds the orientation of the progress bar.

db:section.db:title: style : Component
db:section.db:para: The style Component for this control.

db:member.db:link: Qt Quick Controls Styles QML Types

db:section.db:title: value : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the progress bar's current value. Attempting to change the current value to one outside the minimum-maximum range has no effect on the current value.
